Data Science Blogs

I am passionate in programming in R. I am still learning. I try to prepare east-to-read R blogs for the readers. Recently I am also making attempts in IPython Notebook.

Rpubs

  • Random R Codes Part- 1 — Used packages: countrycode, tableone, aRxiv, exams, gender
  • Random R Codes Part- 2 — Used packages: BCDating, historydata, USAboundaries, verification, dygraphs
  • Random R Codes Part- 3 — Used packages: Factominer, MASS, ade4, ca, homals. Bonus: Few markdown tips.
  • Random R Codes Part- 4 — Used packages: pander, DT, data.table

IPython Notebook

  • Learning IPython Notebooks- Day 2 — Chunk of codes with some basic functions.

Shiny Apps

  • Visualization on Crash Prone Drivers — A shiny app for data visualization of crash prone drivers in Louisiana.

Other Blogs

  • Lafayette Data Visualization — Used package: ggplot2, ggmap.
  • Single Crash in Eight Years (LA) — R codes for analyzing the single vehicle crashes in Louisiana.
